Description: This session will not be livestreamed. To participate, please go to Room 5 in the Convention Center. The Officers and Directors of the AACR Board invite all AACR members to attend this year's Annual Business Meeting for a comprehensive update on all new AACR programs and initiatives, as well as to witness the annual Presidential transfer of power ceremony. This meeting will include: reports from all AACR Officers; In Memoriam for recently deceased members; acknowledgement of new 50-year members, sustaining members, and sponsors; announcement of new Officer and Board of Director election results; and an open forum for discussion of any new business. All AACR members are welcome and highly encouraged to attend this special session. Lunch will be provided.
SearchResultBody: SS06. AACR Annual Business Meeting of Members
Title: AACR Annual Business Meeting of Members
